ComicInfo.Summary:
“WAR ON CHRISTMAS,” Part Four
The Queen of the Northland Elves has a plan to rule all realms, and it looks like she’ll succeed! The Last Kinmundian must reunite with his loyal friend Battlepug and stop her. But first, he has to escape from becoming Juan Diego the Wendigo’s dinner! Fantasy fun and adventure from MIKE NORTON, ALLEN PASSALAQUA, and CRANK!
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|--------------------------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Mike Norton & Allen Passalaqua | 1 | | B | Cover B | Declan Shalvey | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: War on Christmas Part IV
